Name: Shapelab
About the game: Shapelab’s intuitive interface and extensive toolset make it an easy-to-use app for creating organic shapes from simple forms to complex designs. Visualise your creative ideas and print them in 3D or sculpt high quality props, characters and concepts for applications, games, and virtual worlds as well as digital concept art and storyboards. Shapelab’s usage of polygons instead of voxels makes it stand out in the creative VR tools market. Polygonal mesh modeling gives you the ability to sculpt stunning, well-detailed and realistic 3D assets. Step into our virtual lab and unleash your creativity! CORE FEATURES: Brushes and tools Paint brush, Paint bucket, Mask brush, Standard brush, Clay buildup/carve, SnakeHook, Move tool, Inflate/Deflate, Pinch/Crease, Flatten, Trim, Smooth, Regularize, Boolean, 3D Stamp and Cut, Surface stamp Brush modifiers - Size, Strength, Falloff, Resolution (tessellation), Alphas, Brush shapes, Steady stroke, Rotate along drag and various other constraints and modifiers Multi-resolution vs Fixed resolution Sculpting - Turn dynamic resolution sculpting on/off Global topology manipulation and transform - Voxel remesh, Mirror and weld, Subdivide, Decimate, Regularize Polygon editing - Removing, deleting and separating meshes and polygons Multi-object handling - Import, Export and manipulate objects separately - Clone, Mirror, Merge, Subtract, Intersect, Join objects Environments and materials - Numerous realistic materials and diverse environments to choose from Import/export - Import/export FBX, OBJ, STL and GLB files
Meta Title: Shapelab: Mar 23, 2017, Leopoly and Full Overview
